column2: BRIEF-Service Corporation International Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.43 April 25 (Reuters) - Service Corporation International : * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.43 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * CONTINUE TO EXPECT MID-SINGLE DIGIT PERCENTAGE GROWTH IN CEMETERY PRENEED SALES PRODUCTION FOR FULL YEAR OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
